name: request-is-better
description: request-is-better is a TypeScript library which makes it easier to use request-response calls on any channel that implements a send-receive message interface.
author: Yuri Yaryshev

scripts.build:cjs: npm run clean:cjs && babel src --config-file ./babel.cjs.config.cjs --out-dir lib/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps && node cjs_require.test.cjs && echo cjs require is ok!
scripts.watch:cjs: npm run clean:cjs && title request-is-better - watch:cjs & babel src --config-file ./babel.cjs.config.cjs --out-dir lib/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps -w
scripts.build:esm: npm run clean:esm && babel src --config-file ./babel.esm.config.cjs --out-dir lib/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps && node mjs_import.test.mjs && echo mjs import is ok!
scripts.watch:esm: npm run clean:esm && babel src --config-file ./babel.esm.config.cjs --out-dir lib/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps -w
scripts.watch:types: npm run clean:types && title request-is-better - watch:types & tsc -p tsconfig-declarations.json -w
scripts.build:docs: api-extractor run --local && api-documenter markdown --input-folder temp --output-folder docs
scripts.build: npm run precompile_full && npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test_module: node cjs_require.test.cjs && node mjs_import.test.mjs && echo ok
scripts.test: npm run test_module &&  npm run test:cjs_mocha
scripts.republish: yb check-snapshot && npm run build && npx version-select && yb genprojmeta && yb dir_hash && npm publish && yb commit-tag-push
scripts.deps: echo Finding loops in .js requires... & del deps.png & madge dist -c -i deps.png && deps.png
scripts.deps_all: echo Generating full .js requires tree... & del deps.png & madge dist -i deps.png && deps.png
scripts.deps_orphans: echo Finding orphans .js requires... & del deps.png & madge dist --orphans -i deps.png && deps.png
scripts.watch:test:cjs: npm run test_module && npm run build:cjs && jest --config=jest.config-cjs.cjs --passWithNoTests --runInBand -w
scripts.test:cjs: npm run test_module && npm run build:cjs && jest --config=jest.config-cjs.cjs --passWithNoTests --runInBand
scripts.build_lite: npm run precompile && npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.republish_forced: npm run build_lite && npx version-select && yb genprojmeta && npm publish
scripts.test:cjs_jest: npm run test_module && npm run build:cjs && jest --config=jest.config-cjs.cjs --passWithNoTests --runInBand
scripts.test:cjs_mocha: npm run test_module && npm run build:cjs && mocha './lib/cjs/**/*.test.js'
